hero.subText: Join us For an International Training & Tournament Camp in Robotics & Automation and Cybersecurity with Certification!

Robolution.sub1: Robolution, Erovoutikaâ€™s premier robotics competition, fosters global innovation in robotics, cybersecurity, and automation. Established in 2019, it now spans regional to international levels. Robolution Dubai 2025 features competitions, training, awards, and networking.
Robolution.sub2: Robolution Dubai 2025 is open to teachers, faculty, robotics coaches, government employees, students, industry partners, and awardees from around the world.

package.subText: Join us For an International Training & Tournament Camp in Robotics & Automation and Cybersecurity with Certification!

Highlights.Title: KEY HIGHLIGHTS
Highlights.description1: Recognizing outstanding educators and Erovoutika partners in academia and industry.
Highlights.description2: After expert-led training on robotics, research and development, and cybersecurity.
Highlights.description3: To enhance technical and research skills in  journal publication and patenting guidance.
Highlights.description5: with professionals, educators, and industry leaders.

joinContent.title: Join the ROBOLUTION!
joinContent.body: Be part of Robolution Dubai 2025, a global event uniting innovators from multiple countries in robotics, automation, and cybersecurity. Connect, compete, and collaborate with a diverse international community!

FrequentlyAsk.Title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
FrequentlyAsk.description1: Need Help? Check Out Our Most Common Queries
FrequentlyAsk.Question1: WHAT WILL BE THE OUTLINE OF THE EVENT?
FrequentlyAsk.Answer1: Most of the outlines of the event of Erovoutika will be posted weeks prior to the said event, so stay tuned! Additional info shall also be given to your respective email once successfully registered.
FrequentlyAsk.Answer2: Anyone. If you have interest in one of our events no need to hesitate to join us!
FrequentlyAsk.Answer3: Enhance your knowledge, experience and connect with people who have the same interest as you! Join us in our ROBOLUTION!

Hero.title:
BE PART OF THE
FUTURE!
Hero.subtitle: Join us for an International Training & Tournament Camp!

Overview.info: Robolution Dubai 2025 features three dynamic tracks designed to challenge participants in innovation, problem-solving, and technical expertise. Compete against global talents, collaborate with experts, and push the boundaries of technology in the following categories:

Teachers.title: Who can Participate?
Teachers.subtext: Teachers and industry practitioners can form teams of 2 to 5 members to represent their school or company. Using Erobot kits, teams will compete in Robotics & Automation, R&D, and Cybersecurity. The tournament showcases skills gained from a two-day training camp.

Students.subtext: High school or college teams up to 2 to 5 members present their projects in a five-minute pitch, showcasing an innovative, functional prototype. They must also prepare a roll-up poster detailing the title, objectives, methodology, key features, and real-world applications.

Compete.header: Ready to Compete?
Compete.subtext: Be part of Robolution Dubai 2025, a global event uniting innovators from multiple countries in robotics, automation, and cybersecurity. Connect, compete, and collaborate with a diverse international community!
